content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Mr. Wang, it's a pleasure to speak with you regarding our apartment in Magdeburg. At the moment, I have an aggressive negotiation strategy in place to secure the highest price possible. Let's begin discussing the rental price you may have in mind to gauge your interest.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds fair. Let's say the market price for a similar apartment in the city center is around 600 Euros. I am a student, so I am looking for a discount. How about 500 Euros?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While understanding your situation as a student, this proposed rent of 500 Euros is significantly below our target price range. I'm afraid I can't accept this offer, as it doesn't align with my goal of maximizing the revenue from the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Although an improvement from your initial offer, 550 Euros still falls short of the desired rental price. I regret to say that I must continue seeking higher offers to achieve my objectives.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While progressing towards our target range, the proposed rent of 580 Euros is still not sufficient to meet my financial goals for this property. I appreciate your efforts but must continue negotiations to reach an optimal outcome.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: With this rental price of 590 Euros, we are nearing the desired range, but it's not quite there yet. I am obliged to keep striving for the best possible financial returns to maintain my profitability and investment strategies.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: At last, we have reached the rental price I was aiming for, 600 Euros. This aligns perfectly with my objectives in securing the highest revenue for the property. I agree to the price of 600 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
